mdsshellcommand
===============
Invokes console programs from Python, returns the text and return code.

Install
=======
pip install mds-mdsshellcommand

Changes
=======

*0.6.3 - 23.01.2020*

 - fix: unicode handing again

*0.6.2 - 09.01.2019*

 - fix: unicode handing in python2

*0.6.1 - 08.01.2019*

 - convert results to string

*0.6.0 - 13.12.2018*

 - public version
